oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George Ellery Hale to Evelina Hale
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page from a letter written by George Ellery Hale. Appears in a collection of correspondences between George Ellery Hale and Evelina Hale. From the folder: George Ellery Hale to Evelina Hale, Dates: 1926 – 1928, Pages: 138. George Ellery Hale Papers, Caltech Archives, Series 3: Family Letters, Box 81, Folder 2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Unpublished works created by George Ellery Hale are in the public domain and may be reproduced freely. Copyright to works by others, and to Hale’s publications, may be held by their respective creators, those creator’s heirs, or their publishers.
